phase_a.description: Distribution analysis of deflated_sharpe from promotion_gate_audit (last 60 min)

phase_b.diagnosis: SCENARIO_3 - Exploration problem, not threshold problem

key_findings: Median is -4.26, p75 is 0.00 - polarized distribution
No experiments in '0 to 0.5' bucket - gap in distribution

scenario_1.name: Alt er dypt negativt (< -1)
scenario_1.conclusion: RELEVANT - deler er betydelig andel av distribusjonen

scenario_2.name: Mange ligger mellom 0.5 og 1.0
scenario_2.conclusion: IKKE RELEVANT - ingen data i dette intervallet

final_diagnosis.details: 21.3% of experiments exceed threshold (1.0+) but this represents rare 'outliers' in a deeply negative distribution. The median (-4.26) and p75 (0.00) show a polarized distribution where some experiments are clearly superior while most are failing.
final_diagnosis.threshold_assessment: 1.0 threshold is NOT too aggressive. The problem is model quality, not gate strictness.
final_diagnosis.recommendation: Ikke senk terskelen. Fokuser på å forstå hvorfor 21.3% klarer seg og hvorfor 64% er dypt negative.
